00011 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00012 // Low-level initialization of the chip.
00013 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014 extern "C" void DEV_Init1( void )
00015 {
00016     // Sets the correct number of wait states in the flash controller
00017     //
00018 #ifdef AT91C_FLASH_WAIT_STATES
00019     SET( AT91C_BASE_FLASH->FLA_FMR, AT91C_FLASH_WAIT_STATES );
00020 #endif
00021 
00022     // Disable the watchdog
00023     //
00024     AT91C_BASE_WDTC->WDTC_WDMR = AT91C_WDTC_WDDIS;
00025 
00026     // Enable user reset: assertion length programmed to 1 ms
00027     //
00028     AT91C_BASE_RSTC->RSTC_RMR = AT91C_RSTC_URSTEN | (0x4 << 8) | ((uint) 0xA5 << 24);
00029     
00030     // Start clocks
00031     //
00032     DEV_Resume ();
00033 
00034     /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00035     // Configure PIO
00036     //
00037     AT91F_PMC_EnablePeriphClock( AT91C_BASE_PMC, 1 << AT91C_ID_PIOA );
00038 
00039     // NOTE: DO NOT USE AT91F_CfgPullup() function because it both enables and disables
00040     // pull-ups at the same time (and does that incorrectly).
00041 
00042     // Enable Pull-ups
00043     AT91C_BASE_PIOA->PIO_PPUER 
00044         = FPGA_JTAG_TDO | FPGA_DATA | FPGA_INTn | FPGA_RESET | PUSHBUTTON1;
00045 
00046     // Disable Pull-ups
00047     AT91C_BASE_PIOA->PIO_PPUDR 
00048         = FPGA_RDn | FPGA_WRn | FPGA_ADDR | FPGA_RESET 
00049         | LED_POWER | LED_USB
00050         | FPGA_JTAG_TCK | FPGA_JTAG_TMS | FPGA_JTAG_TDI;
00051 
00052     // Configure Input Pins
00053     AT91F_PIO_CfgInput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, 
00054         FPGA_JTAG_TDO | FPGA_DATA | FPGA_INTn | PUSHBUTTON1
00055         );
00056 
00057     // Set Output Bits
00058     AT91F_PIO_SetOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, 
00059         FPGA_JTAG_TMS | FPGA_RDn | FPGA_WRn | FPGA_DATA | FPGA_RESET 
00060         | LED_POWER | LED_USB
00061         );
00062 
00063     // Clear Output Bits
00064     AT91F_PIO_ClearOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA,
00065         FPGA_JTAG_TCK | FPGA_JTAG_TDI | FPGA_ADDR
00066         );
00067 
00068     // Configure Output Pins
00069     AT91F_PIO_CfgOutput( AT91C_BASE_PIOA, 
00070         FPGA_JTAG_TMS | FPGA_JTAG_TCK | FPGA_JTAG_TDI 
00071         | FPGA_RDn | FPGA_WRn | FPGA_RESET | FPGA_ADDR 
00072         | LED_POWER | LED_USB
00073         );
00074 
00075     // Configure Direct Write Output Pins
00076     AT91F_PIO_CfgDirectDrive( AT91C_BASE_PIOA,
00077         FPGA_RDn | FPGA_WRn | FPGA_ADDR | FPGA_DATA 
00078         );
00079     }
00080 
00081 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 // Additional initialization (called after data & bss init, but before ctor init).
00083 // Initialize trace functionality so we could use tracef() in C++ constructors.
00084 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 extern "C" void DEV_Init2( void )
00086 {
00087     /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00088     // Initialize US1 port and open it as trace stream descriptor 0 (stdout)
00089     //
00090     uint dMCK = AT91C_MASTER_CLOCK; // Main oscillator frequency
00091     uint dBaudrate = 115200;        // Desired baudrate
00092 
00093     // Clock US1 serial port and configure its pins
00094     //
00095     AT91F_PMC_EnablePeriphClock
00096     (
00097         AT91C_BASE_PMC, // PIO controller base address
00098         uint( 1 << AT91C_ID_US1 )
00099         );
00100 
00101     // Configure PIO controllers to periph mode
00102     //
00103     AT91F_PIO_CfgPeriph
00104     (
00105         AT91C_BASE_PIOA, // PIO controller base address
00106         uint( AT91C_PA22_TXD1 ) |
00107         uint( AT91C_PA21_RXD1 ), // Peripheral A
00108         0 // Peripheral B
00109         );
00110 
00111     // Configure serial port baud rate and sync/async mode
00112     //
00113     AT91F_US_Configure
00114     (
00115         (AT91PS_USART) AT91C_BASE_US1,
00116         dMCK,
00117         AT91C_US_ASYNC_MODE,
00118         dBaudrate,
00119         0
00120         );
00121 
00122     // Enable Transmitter & Receiver
00123     //
00124     AT91F_US_EnableTx( (AT91PS_USART) AT91C_BASE_US1 );
00125     AT91F_US_EnableRx( (AT91PS_USART) AT91C_BASE_US1 );
00126     
00127     /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00128     // Open output descriptors
00129 
00130     tracef_open( 0, us1_putc, /*LF2CRLF=*/ true, /*TimeStamp=*/ true );
00131     tracef_open( 1, us1_putc, /*LF2CRLF=*/ true, /*TimeStamp=*/ true );
00132     tracef_open( 2, usb_putc, /*LF2CRLF=*/ false, /*TimeStamp=*/ false );
00133     tracef_open( 3, usb_putc, /*LF2CRLF=*/ false, /*TimeStamp=*/ false );
00134 
00135     TRACE_INFO( "\nSAM7 XPU-D R2A v%d.%d (Build %d)\n", verMajor, verMinor, verBuild );
00136     TRACE_INFO( "--------------------------\n" );
00137 
00138     /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00139     // Report PIO configuration
00140 
00141     TRACE_INFO( "PSR:  %08x\n", AT91F_PIO_GetStatus( AT91C_BASE_PIOA ) );
00142     TRACE_INFO( "PUSR: %08x\n", AT91F_PIO_GetCfgPullup( AT91C_BASE_PIOA ) );
00143     TRACE_INFO( "OSR:  %08x\n", AT91F_PIO_GetOutputStatus( AT91C_BASE_PIOA ) );
00144     TRACE_INFO( "OWSR: %08x\n", AT91F_PIO_GetOutputWriteStatus( AT91C_BASE_PIOA ) );
00145     TRACE_INFO( "ODSR: %08x\n", AT91F_PIO_GetOutputDataStatus( AT91C_BASE_PIOA ) );
00146     TRACE_INFO( "--------------------------\n" );
00147     }
00148 
00149 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00150 // Puts the device back into a normal operation mode
00151 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00152 extern "C" void DEV_Resume( void )
00153 {
00154     // Enable Main Oscillator
00155     // Main Oscillator startup time is board specific:
00156     // Main Oscillator Startup Time (18432KHz) corresponds to 1.5ms
00157     // (0x08 for AT91C_CKGR_OSCOUNT field)
00158     //
00159     AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_MOR = ( AT91C_CKGR_OSCOUNT & ( 0x8 << 8 ) )
00160                               | AT91C_CKGR_MOSCEN;
00161 
00162     // Wait until the oscillator is stabilized
00163     //
00164     do ; while( ! ISSET( AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_SR, AT91C_PMC_MOSCS ) );
00165 
00166     // Set PLL to 96MHz (96,10971429MHz) and UDP Clock to 48MHz
00167     // PLL Startup time depends on PLL RC filter
00168     // UDP Clock (48,05485714MHz=+0,114%) is compliant with the Universal Serial Bus
00169     // Specification (+/- 0.25% for full speed)
00170     //
00171     AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_PLLR 
00172        = AT91C_CKGR_USBDIV_1                        // DIV = 2
00173        | AT91C_CKGR_OUT_0
00174        | ( AT91C_CKGR_PLLCOUNT & ( 0x28 << 8 ) )    // PLLCOUNT = 50
00175        | ( AT91C_CKGR_MUL & ( 0x48 << 16 ) )        // MUL = 72
00176        | ( AT91C_CKGR_DIV & 0xE );                  // DIV = 14
00177 
00178     // Wait until the PLL is stabilized
00179     do ; while( ! ISSET( AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_SR, AT91C_PMC_LOCK ) );
00180 
00181     // Selection of Master Clock MCK (equal to Processor Clock PCK) equal to
00182     // PLL/2 = 48MHz
00183     // The PMC_MCKR register must not be programmed in a single write operation
00184     // (see. Product Errata Sheet)
00185     AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_MCKR = AT91C_PMC_PRES_CLK_2;
00186     do ; while( ! ISSET( AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_SR, AT91C_PMC_MCKRDY ) );
00187 
00188     SET(AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_MCKR, AT91C_PMC_CSS_PLL_CLK );
00189     do ; while( ! ISSET( AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_SR, AT91C_PMC_MCKRDY ) );
00190     }
00191 
00192 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00193 // Puts the device into low-power mode.
00194 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00195 void DEV_Suspend( void )
00196 {
00197     // Voltage regulator in standby mode : Enable VREG Low Power Mode
00198     AT91C_BASE_VREG->VREG_MR |= AT91C_VREG_PSTDBY;
00199 
00200     // Set the master clock on slow clock
00201     AT91F_PMC_CfgMCKReg( AT91C_BASE_PMC, AT91C_PMC_PRES_CLK_2 );
00202     do ; while( ! ISSET( AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_SR, AT91C_PMC_MCKRDY ) );
00203 
00204     AT91F_PMC_CfgMCKReg( AT91C_BASE_PMC, AT91C_PMC_CSS_SLOW_CLK );
00205     do ; while( ! ISSET(AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_SR, AT91C_PMC_MCKRDY ) );
00206 
00207     // Disable the PLL
00208     AT91F_CKGR_CfgPLLReg( AT91C_BASE_CKGR, 0 );
00209 
00210     // Disable the main Oscillator
00211     AT91C_BASE_PMC->PMC_MOR = 0;
00212     }
